column5: I had the chance to go shad fishing in Maryland. While i caught some small shad I was lucky enough to catch 5 striped bass. All were caught on a light action rod with 6lb test and 1/8 ounce shad dart. Excellent fight on light tackle. All the fish were released. .
Beauties Matt
Catching striped bass in your waders!,awesome !
Nice. How was the Pit Beef or is it too early for that?
Very nice I'm green with envy.
Thanks guys!
That looks like a ton of fun
You're right, on the right tackle they are a blast.
lol is that a dead carp in the 3rd pic?
Some one actually had it on a stringer.
That would be a blast.  Nice
Some one actually had it on a stringer. a carp? not something i hear often.
Cool !
nice striped bass the first 2 are hybrids and the other three are pure ..... they are a blast to catch ... and very good eating .. as long as you get all the red flesh from them
Just a curiosity, can you catch this striped bass in Ontario?  Thanks
No you all chose Muskies instead lol.  Art

Nice fish Matt I know where you where fishing . I'm from Pa and fish down stream from you where the river empties into the Flats . The season now is all catch and release until mid May but you have a chance at some really nice fish . My son and I like to fish with Top Water lures for the Stripers . Here is one of the bigger ones my son caught a couple years ago . We use our Muskie rods for the bigger ones and cast big top water lures.
Really cool cottage industry making wooden top water plugs for Stripers. I'm looking for a ditch cruiser for my Cape Cod trip in Sept.
Nice fish!
Those are some nice looking fish. It seems some of you have never tried smoked carp. I found them one of the best fish for smoking.

Nice fish Matt I know where you where fishing . I'm from Pa and fish down stream from you where the river empties into the Flats .
